casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harry Sharod JAMES 514PA11-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 14, 2017 David W. Andrews, Assistant Appellate Defender, for James, Harry Sharod. Sandra Wallace-Smith, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Eric J. Zogry, Juvenile Defender, Marsha L. Levick, Attorney at Law, for Juvenile Law Center. Mark Dorosin, Attorney at Law, Elizabeth M. Haddix, Attorney at Law, Pittsboro, Jennifer W. Marsh, Director of Research, Brent Ducharme, Attorney at Law, Allen Buansi, Attorney at Law, K. Ricky Watson, Jr., Co-Director of Youth Justice Project, Peggy Nicholson, Attorney at Law, for Senator Angela Bryant, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 12th of June 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of June 2017."

Plaintiff-Appellee shall have up to and including the 19th day of July 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
